"A.P.241/12/24 16:00": "Ladies aaand gentlemeeeen!"
"Greetings to all you ARKS ships out there, we're coming to you live from the Century Battle Hall!"
"Your host for today's event is the Combat Commander you all know and love, Huey!"
"And I'm Combat Deputy Claris Claes! Welcome, everyone!"
"Th-This is way more intense than I expected...! Everyone's making this out to be some kind of huge event...!"
"Should we call it off after all?"
"We'll just have to make the most of it"
"...No! This kind of chance doesn't come around often!"
"...Yes! I'll show everyone what I'm capable of by putting my very best into it!"
"And besides, I'm super excited to be facing off against a Guardian such as yourself!"
"Alright! Let's hurry up and introduce our contenders!"

"There's not an ARKS alive who hasn't heard of them! 'Living legend' is too modest a title for them! They've defeated more evils than stars in the sky, and saved more lives than the space between them!"
"The Guardian, <%me>! Not even Xiao knows they're here!"
"Facing off against them is the shining hope of the Combat Division's New Tactics Development Group! Founder of the brand-new Hero Class!"
"And her name is Stratos! Gaze upon that confident stride, and burn the image into your memory!"
"It's too late to turn back now! ...<%me>! Give me everything you've got!"
"Things were just getting started! Wait, we're picking up Darkers in the residential area?! There wasn't even any Omen!"
"It's unfortunate, but we'll have to suspend the match! To all citizens watching, please follow the guidance of the ARKS and seek shelter!"
"Darkers in the residential area...!"
"Commander, Deputy! I can deploy immediately! I'll head over and begin rescue efforts!"
"What are you talking about? You can't go alone!"
"I'll be alright! This is one of my specialties! ...I'm heading out!"
"Ah- wait, Stratos!"
"<%me>. Sorry, but..."
"I'm already on it"
"Just leave it to me"
"...You have my thanks!"
"The Hero"
"Side Story: The Figure She's Followed"
